name: Kanye Quest 3030
storyline: In January 2010, as rapper and producer Kanye West is taking the garbage out one day, he suddenly travels through a wormhole. Emerging on the other side, Kanye finds himself in the year 3030. In a dystopian city filled with clones of hip-hop musicians and under the control of a god-like dictator, can Kanye get back home?
summary: Kanye Quest 3030 is a hip-hop-themed science-fiction 2D roleplaying game starring Kanye West.
